name: Omni-Veil
effects: Increase resistance to all elements by 30% for 3 turns to all allies
Increase resistance to all status effects by 50% for all allies for 3 turns

name: Omni-Veil
全能面紗
전능의 베일
Voile suprême
Omni-Schleier
Velo supremo
desc_short: Boost fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance, and poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone resistance for all allies
提高全體隊員火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性的數值同時提高中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化耐性的數值
아군 전체의 불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력과 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력 상승
Augmente la rés. feu/glace/foudre/eau/vent/terre/lumière/ténèbres/poi./céc./som./sil./para./conf./mala./pétri. pour tous les alliés
Erhöht Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel, Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein, alle Verb.
Aumenta la res. de todos los aliados al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz, oscuridad, ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf y pie
desc_long: Boosts fire, ice, lightning, water, wind, earth, light, and dark resistance, and poison, blind, sleep, silence, paralysis, confusion, disease, and stone resistance for all allies.
提高全體隊員火冰雷水風土光暗屬性耐性的數值，同時提高中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化耐性的數值。
아군 전체의 불, 얼음, 번개, 물, 바람, 땅, 빛, 어둠속성 저항력과 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 저항력이 상승합니다.
Augmente la rés. feu/glace/foudre/eau/vent/terre/lumière/ténèbres/poi./céc./som./sil./para./conf./mala./pétri. pour tous les alliés
Erhöht Res. gegen Feuer, Eis, Blitz, Wasser, Wind, Licht und Dunkel, Gift, Blenden, Schlaf, Stille,Lähmung, Konfus, Virus und Stein, alle Verb.
Aumenta la resistencia de todos los aliados al fuego, hielo, rayo, agua, viento, tierra, luz, oscuridad, veneno, ceguera, sueño, silencio, parálisis, confusión, enfermedad y piedra.
